content.title: Intro
content.content:
1984
Preceded by
1984
1985
Year
1986
Followed by
1986

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1985.

content.title: March
content.content:
? - J.R.R. Tolkien's Letters to Rhona Beare is published.
? - Gary Gygax publishes the essay "The influence of J.R.R. Tolkien on the D&D and AD&D games" in Dragon magazine.

content.title: April
content.content:
25 - A Path from Rome: An Autobiography, which includes a reminiscence of J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
? - Mallorn 22 is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
? - Masterpieces of Terror and the Supernatural, including J.R.R. Tolkien's first edition of Riddles in the Dark, is published.
? - Beyond Bree May 1985, including J.R.R. Tolkien's 'Concerning ... 'The Hoard' and Kinship of the Half-elven, is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
24 - Actor Valentine Dyall dies.
? - Beyond Bree June 1985, including J.R.R. Tolkien's 'Kinship of the Half-elven', is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
17 - Robert Havard, Inkling, dies.
26-29 - Mythcon 16.
? - Some Light on Middle-earth is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
22 - The Lays of Beleriand is published in the UK.
29 - Actor Patrick Barr dies.

content.title: November
content.content: 20 - The Lays of Beleriand is published in the US.

? - The Hobbit (1985 television film) is released in the Soviet Union
? - James Dundas-Grant, Inkling, dies.
? - Author Alan Bliss dies.
? - The Polish Tolkien Society is founded.
? - Melbourne House publishes Lord of the Rings: Game One
? - Riders of Rohan (1985 book) is published.
? - Thieves of Tharbad is published.
? - Erech and the Paths of the Dead is published.
? - Goblin-gate and Eagle's Eyrie is published.
? - Haunted Ruins of the Dunlendings is published.
? - Grenadier Models Inc. releases metal miniatures for ICE's MERP.
? - Inklings Calendar 1986 released.
? - The 1986 Tolkien Calendar released.
? - The Hobbit Calendar 1986 released.
? - The 1986 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar released.
? - Beyond Bree 1986 Tolkien Calendar released.




Years
1982 1983 1984 1985 1986 1987 1988
